title: Fabulous tomato chutney
ingredients: ['2.75kg ripe tomatoes', '775g sugar', '8 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice', '4 tablespoons freshly grated root ginger', '4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '4 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper']
